Artist Who Code

Many Artists are now enjoying a career in software development as a way to fund their freelance artistic endevours.
Artists Who Code are a facebook group where artists can share their stories and interact with other people who are freelance
in the arts whilst working as a software developer.
They run workshops on various interesting topics
for example how to find work as a freelance software developer and what this might involve.

For More information on Artist Who Code:


  • LinkedIn Artists Who Code

  • Instagram Artists Who Code
